mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT P1.PRTNR_NO AS CODE_ID , P1.PRTNR_KNM AS CODE_NAME , P1.OG_ID , P1.OG_NM FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ P1 WHERE 1=1
AND P1.OG_ID = (SELECT OG_ID FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ WHERE 1=1 AND BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM') AND PRTNR_NO = #{loginPrtnrNo} AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND OG_TP_CD IN ('W03', 'W06') )
AND P1.OG_ID = #{ogId}
AND P1.BZ_STAT_CD = '1' ORDER BY P1.PRTNR_KNM
SELECT OG_ID AS CODE_ID , OG_NM AS CODE_NAME FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ WHERE 1=1 AND CLO_DT IS NULL AND OG_ID != '79999' AND BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') ORDER BY CODE_NAME
